about_the_game:
Every bullet, rocket, laser beam, or piece of debris changes its trajectory under the influence of planetary gravity. Master these effects, because the enemy already uses them for both defense and crushing attacks.


Adapt yourself

Each mission will require its own set of tools and strategies. Prepare your ship, weapons, and intelligence!

Personal stories combined in history

You are not a hero who will save everyone alone. But you create history together with others. Will you be able to protect your relatives from the bloodthirsty imperials?

Each flight is unique

Computer-generated levels and random power-ups that drop from enemies make each attempt unique.

Add to wishlist right now!

short_description: Master the effect of gravity on the bullets and find out which characters are who in order to defend against the attack of the empire! Immerse yourself in the symbiosis of a top-down shooter and an arcade adventure.
